title: Yet Another Xor Problem
statement: Rehan has started to explore different bitwise operations. Today, he is studying bitwise XOR operation. He has two integers l and r. He wants to find two integers a and b such that l ≤ a < b ≤ r and the value of a XOR b is maximum possible. Help Rehan find the maximum value of a XOR b so he can move on to next problem.
input: The first line contains an integer l and the second line contains an integer r (1 ≤ l ≤ r ≤ 103).
output: Print a single integer â€” the maximum value of a XOR b.
